text: Does any one know a solution in hubl to retrieve a dnd_module value?

sounds like a good flow, thanks for showing me the "content staging". I will continue to dev the theme via cli on sandbox and then upload it to prod and start cloning pages.  This was a huge help in getting the other team members on board with doing a new site in HS

Can anyone help provide some guidance on implementing a public api? Can this be done with serverless functions?

edit: I’ve deployed my first serverless function!

Not in an automated way, unfortunately not. Gatsby does a lot under the hood to deliver really impressive performance and allows for content ingestion from a wide range of HEADLESS CMSs, but HubSpot is a SaaS CMS, which means for website pages it isn't compatible.
